level.text: 829.1 The Department shall establish and maintain a centralized list of CBEs.

829.2 The Department’s centralized list of CBEs shall set forth the name ofach CBE, contact information for each CBE, the CBE’s certificationategories, the procurement categories along with the names of the CBEsertified in each procurement category, and the expiration date of the CBE’segistration.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 9052 (December 4, 1992); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 8439 (October 23, 2009),ncorporating by reference text of Proposed Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 5622,643 (July 10, 2009).
